exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MonsterFightShowSkin" width="480" height="160" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="open_bg_main_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image source="star_monster_5" x="289" y="22"/>
	<e:Image source="star_monster_4" x="123" y="26"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameLoadingBarSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="300" height="40">
	<e:Image source="ui_loading_barBg" x="33" y="2"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" y="11" left="41" source="ui_loading_bar" right="33"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="标签" horizontalCenter="0" size="14" y="14"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameLoadingSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="loading_bg_top_png" scale9Grid="8,8,93,18" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image source="logo_png" horizontalCenter="0" top="0" width="600" height="600"/>
	<e:ProgressBar id="loadingBar" skinName="GameLoadingBarSkin" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="100"/>
	<e:Button id="loginBtn" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="40">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="loading_login_png" source.down="loading_login_png" source.disabled="loading_login_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameOverSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"></e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameViewSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PassSelectShowSkin" width="480" height="600" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Scroller id="passListScroll" width="480" horizontalCenter="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Group>
			<e:List id="passList" y="9" itemRendererSkinName="PassItemRendererSkin" itemRenderer="PassItemRenderer" horizontalCenter="0" allowMultipleSelection="false">
				<e:ArrayCollection>
					<e:Array>
						<e:Object label="数据1"/>
						<e:Object label="数据2"/>
						<e:Object label="数据3"/>
					</e:Array>
				</e:ArrayCollection>
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout gap="0" paddingBottom="30" paddingTop="100" verticalAlign="middle"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:List>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PlayerDataShowSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="460" height="44">
	<e:Image id="actIcon" source="ui_json.ui_user_infoAct" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="-155"/>
	<e:Image id="dimIcon" source="ui_json.ui_user_infoDim" verticalCenter="2.5" horizontalCenter="155.5"/>
	<e:Image id="goldIcon" source="ui_json.ui_user_infoGold" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="actBit" text="30/30" x="40" y="15" size="18" width="72" textAlign="center" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label id="dimBit" size="18" text="88888888" width="80" horizontalCenter="2" verticalCenter="2" height="18" textAlign="center" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label id="goldBit" size="18" text="8888888" width="75" right="34" verticalCenter="2" textAlign="center" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="starBit" text="1234" font="number_fnt" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" x="248" y="11" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameHomeSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="ui_passOneShow_png" scale9Grid="24,57,175,94"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_user_glodbg_top" scale9Grid="13,11,82,13" left="10" right="10" top="10" bottom="14" visible="false"/>
	<ns1:PassSelectShow id="passSelectShow" skinName="PassSelectShowSkin" top="10" bottom="16" horizontalCenter="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Button id="gamePlayBtn" horizontalCenter="0" width="200" height="60" bottom="10" visible="false">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="star_rect_4" source.down="star_rect_4" source.disabled="star_rect_4"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<ns1:PlayerDataShow id="playerDataShow" skinName="PlayerDataShowSkin" top="8" horizontalCenter="0" locked="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PassClickBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="63" height="67">
	<e:Image id="clickBg" source="ui_starOneBg_0"/>
	<e:Image id="rankIcon" source="ui_pass_cupIcon1" x="4" y="-23" visible="false"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="passIndex" font="number_fnt" text="100" horizontalCenter="0" top="12" scaleX="0.6" scaleY="0.6"/>
	<e:Image id="star_1" source="ui_pass_starIcon" x="3" y="35" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5"/>
	<e:Image id="star_2" source="ui_pass_starIcon" y="42" scaleY="0.5" x="21" scaleX="0.5"/>
	<e:Image id="star_3" source="ui_pass_starIcon" y="35" scaleY="0.5" scaleX="0.5" x="39"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PassItemRendererSkin" width="400" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*" height="40">
	<ns1:PassClickBtn id="clickBtn" label="按钮" x="19" skinName="PassClickBtnSkin" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PassMonsterSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="160" height="160"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bgImg" source="ui_starOneBg_1" scale9Grid="15,14,34,32" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" source="star_monster_3" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="unlock" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Image source="notClickImg_png" left="5" right="4" top="4" bottom="15"/>
		<e:Image source="ui_pass_starIcon" x="23" y="44"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="unlockBit" x="66" y="47" font="number_fnt" text="123"/>
		<e:Label text="解锁" x="45" y="91" bold="true" size="36"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PassStartMainSkin" width="360" height="360" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="ui_pass_mainBg" scale9Grid="26,52,18,55"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_user_glodbg_top" left="12" right="12" top="51" bottom="12" scale9Grid="15,15,80,5"/>
	<e:Button id="startBtn" bottom="32" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="passMain_start" source.down="passMain_start" source.disabled="passMain_start"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="exitBtn" top="10" width="40" height="40" right="10">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ui_windows_close" source.down="ui_windows_close" source.disabled="ui_windows_close"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label id="idLabel" text="第x关" top="14" horizontalCenter="0" textColor="0x000000"/>
	<e:Label x="120" y="218" textColor="0x100101" text="关卡介绍"/>
	<e:Image id="star_1" x="77" y="132" source="ui_pass_starIcon"/>
	<e:Image id="star_2" source="ui_pass_unstarIcon" x="163" y="132"/>
	<e:Image id="star_3" source="ui_pass_unstarIcon" x="249" y="132"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="pointMaxBit" font="number_fnt" text="123456" horizontalCenter="0" top="78"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="BalanceMainSkin" width="300" height="420" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="ui_passSelectMainBg_png" scale9Grid="64,55,146,114" locked="true"/>
	<e:Button id="rePlayBtn" label="再来" x="38" y="341" width="100" height="39">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ui_user_playerIcon" source.down="ui_user_playerIcon" source.disabled="ui_user_playerIcon"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button x="165" y="341" label="下一关" id="nextPassBtn">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ui_user_playerIcon" source.down="ui_user_playerIcon" source.disabled="ui_user_playerIcon"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="exitBtn" y="-2" x="215">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ui_windows_close" source.down="ui_windows_close" source.disabled="ui_windows_close"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label id="passIsSuc" text="过关" x="110" y="10"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_pass_starIcon" x="31" y="156"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_pass_starIcon" y="154" x="73"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_pass_unstarIcon" x="53" y="162"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="pointBit" font="number_fnt" text="12345678" horizontalCenter="0" top="80"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_user_goldIcon" bottom="110" left="46"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="getGold" font="number_fnt" text="0" left="98" bottom="109"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SkillBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="90" height="110"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" source="star_rect_1" top="7"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel x="53" y="59" font="number_fnt" text="11" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:Image source="notClickImg_png" width="90" x="0" height="47" y="43" locked="true" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="标签" size="22" bold="true" horizontalCenter="0" top="85"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SkillPlayShowSkin" width="480" height="80" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<ns1:SkillBtn id="skillBtn_1" label="相邻交换" x="7" skinName="SkillBtnSkin" icon="star_rect_1"/>
	<ns1:SkillBtn id="skillBtn_2" label="单个变色" skinName="SkillBtnSkin" x="100" icon="star_rect_2"/>
	<ns1:SkillBtn id="skillBtn_3" label="重新排列" skinName="SkillBtnSkin" x="194" icon="star_rect_3"/>
	<ns1:SkillBtn id="skillBtn_4" label="增加步数" skinName="SkillBtnSkin" x="287" icon="star_rect_4"/>
	<ns1:SkillBtn id="skillBtn_5" label="重置冷却" skinName="SkillBtnSkin" x="380" icon="star_rect_5"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="TaskOneSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="90" height="90"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="ui_user_glodbg_top" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" scale9Grid="7,7,95,20"/>
	<e:Image id="iconDisplay" source="star_monster_3" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="taskNumber" font="number_fnt" text="12" right="4" bottom="2"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="TaskPlayShowSkin" width="480" height="200" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="ui_homeBg_top" horizontalCenter="0" top="0"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_homeBg_bot" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Label text="关卡提示/剧情介绍" x="36" y="25"/>
	<ns1:TaskOne id="task_1" x="16" icon="star_monster_3" skinName="TaskOneSkin" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" bottom="20">
	</ns1:TaskOne>
	<ns1:TaskOne id="task_2" skinName="TaskOneSkin" x="104" icon="star_monster_2" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" bottom="20"/>
	<ns1:TaskOne id="task_3" skinName="TaskOneSkin" x="193" icon="star_monster_4" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" bottom="20"/>
	<ns1:TaskOne id="task_4" skinName="TaskOneSkin" x="281" icon="star_monster_5" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" bottom="20"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="stepLeave" text="32" font="number_fnt" right="30" bottom="30"/>
	<e:Image right="14" top="14" source="ui_json.ui_play_stop"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="StarViewSkin" width="480" height="480" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="ui_homeBg_center" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="30" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_homeBg_bot" left="0" right="0" bottom="0" height="160" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_homeBg_top" left="0" right="0" top="-40" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_starViewBg" width="450" height="450" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="StarBox" scrollEnabled="true" width="450" height="450" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="PosBox" touchChildren="false" touchEnabled="false" scrollEnabled="true" width="450" height="450" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PointPlayShowSkin" width="480" height="40" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="ui_pointBar_bg" verticalCenter="0" left="0"/>
	<e:Image id="pointBar" source="ui_pointBar_bar" x="15" y="11"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_pointBar_top" left="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="img_1" x="115" source="ui_pass_starIcon" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="img_2" x="233" source="ui_pass_starIcon" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="img_3" x="303" verticalCenter="0" source="ui_pass_starIcon"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="point" text="123" font="number_fnt" scaleX="0.4" scaleY="0.4" right="24" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GamePlaySkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<ns1:SkillPlayShow id="skillPlayShow" skinName="SkillPlayShowSkin" bottom="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<ns1:TaskPlayShow id="taskPlayShow" skinName="TaskPlayShowSkin" horizontalCenter="0" top="0"/>
	<e:Image id="useSkillBg" source="notClickImg_png" right="-10" left="-10" top="-10" bottom="-10" locked="true"/>
	<e:Button id="cancelBtn" label="取消" x="181" y="736" width="120" height="40">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ui_user_playerIcon" source.down="ui_user_playerIcon" source.disabled="ui_user_playerIcon"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<ns1:StarView id="starView" skinName="StarViewSkin" horizontalCenter="0" top="240"/>
	<ns1:PointPlayShow id="pointPlayShow" skinName="PointPlayShowSkin" horizontalCenter="0" top="210" touchChildren="false" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<ns1:BalanceMain id="balanceMain" skinName="BalanceMainSkin" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ShopGoodsSkin" width="340" height="80" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="ui_homeBg_center" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Button id="buyBtn" label="购买" verticalCenter="16" right="10" width="88" height="22">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ui_user_glodbg_top" source.down="ui_user_glodbg_top" source.disabled="ui_user_glodbg_top"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label text="物品名字" x="109" y="29" size="22"/>
	<e:Label y="14" size="22" text="10元" x="258"/>
	<e:Image source="ui_user_dimIcon" x="35" y="22"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="DimShopMainSkin" width="400" height="400" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="ui_passOneShow_png" scale9Grid="67,61,129,82" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<ns1:ShopGoods x="29" y="116" skinName="ShopGoodsSkin"/>
	<ns1:ShopGoods y="201" skinName="ShopGoodsSkin" x="29"/>
	<ns1:ShopGoods y="286" skinName="ShopGoodsSkin" x="29"/>
	<e:Button id="closeBtn" x="335" y="9">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ui_windows_close" source.down="ui_windows_close" source.disabled="ui_windows_close"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="SkillChangeColorShowSkin" width="200" height="60" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="changeColor_1" x="8" source="star_monster_1" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" y="3"/>
	<e:Image source="star_monster_1" x="56" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" id="changeColor_2" y="3"/>
	<e:Image source="star_monster_1" x="103" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" id="changeColor_3" y="3"/>
	<e:Image source="star_monster_1" x="150" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" id="changeColor_4" y="3"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PosOneSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="70" height="70"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"></e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="StarOneSkin" states="up,down,disabled" width="45" height="45"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="starImg" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0" source="star_monster_5" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5"/>
	<e:Label id="idText" text="标签" x="4" y="4" size="18" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="notClickImg" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="notClickImg_png" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>
